tooltips.dailyVolatility: Volatility of daily trading volume measured as the standard deviation of daily percent changes. Lower = steadier activity.
tooltips.volumeDistribution: Distribution of daily volume across percentiles (p10..p90) within the selected timeframe.
tooltips.dataCoverage: Share of expected days with available volume data in the selected timeframe.

sentiment.title: Market Sentiment
sentiment.subtitle: Fear & Greed, historical trends, and market interpretation
sentiment.deprecatedNotice: Heads up: this legacy sentiment section is deprecated and will be replaced by a new AI-based version soon.

tooltips.currentIndex: Composite sentiment index (0-100) derived from multiple components. Higher = more greed, lower = more fear.
tooltips.zoneDistribution: Share of days spent in each sentiment zone within the selected period.
tooltips.metrics7d: 7-day summary stats of the index: average, min, max, and volatility.
tooltips.transitionMatrix: Probability of moving from one zone to another based on historical transitions.
tooltips.dataQuality: Coverage and completeness indicators for the analyzed period.

sentiment.transitionDescription: Probability of moving from one sentiment zone to another based on historical data.

forecast.title: Price Forecast
forecast.subtitle: Model-based projections, targets and confidence bands
forecast.deprecatedNotice: Heads up: this legacy forecast section is deprecated and will be replaced by a new AI-based version soon.

tooltips.confidence: Confidence reflects historical accuracy of the model on past data (backtests). Higher means forecasts tended to match realized outcomes more closely.
tooltips.confidenceBands: Predicted price bands around the central forecast. 68% ≈ ±1σ and 95% ≈ ±2σ under normal-like errors.
tooltips.accuracy: Accuracy aggregates error metrics like MAPE/MAE/RMSE and hit/directional rates over the backtest period.
tooltips.marketOutlook: Qualitative summary combining trend direction, momentum, and confidence to describe near-term outlook.
tooltips.overallAccuracy: Overall accuracy ≈ 100 − MAPE from the backtest window. Higher = past forecasts were closer to realized prices.
tooltips.mape: MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error): average of |(forecast − actual)/actual| × 100 over the backtest.
tooltips.mae: MAE (Mean Absolute Error): average of |forecast − actual|; expresses typical absolute error in price units.
tooltips.rmse: RMSE (Root Mean Squared Error): square root of the mean of squared errors; penalizes larger errors more heavily.
tooltips.bias: Bias: average of (forecast − actual); positive = systematic overprediction, negative = underprediction.
tooltips.hitRate: Directional accuracy (hit rate): share of periods where the model predicted the correct up/down move.
tooltips.errorMetrics: MAE, RMSE, and Bias computed over the backtest to quantify typical error magnitude and any systematic tilt.
tooltips.confidenceIntervals: Interval estimates for expected percent changes. 68% ≈ ±1σ; 95% ≈ ±2σ under normal-like errors.
tooltips.targetPrice: Point estimates for price at future horizons (e.g., 7D/30D). Often the model's central/median path.
tooltips.horizon: Backtest/forecast window used by the model and the specific algorithm/components applied.
tooltips.technicals: Technical context derived from price/volume: MAs, RSI/MACD momentum, Bollinger bands, ATR, trend, and volume.
tooltips.movingAverages: Simple/Exponential moving averages (e.g., SMA20/50/200, EMA12/26) as smoothing of recent prices.
tooltips.momentum: Momentum indicators like RSI and MACD that summarize overbought/oversold and trend strength/turns.
tooltips.bollingerBands: Upper/Middle/Lower bands built around a moving average using price volatility; bandwidth gauges compression/expansion.
tooltips.volatility: ATR and related measures of typical move size; ATR% scales ATR by price for comparability (higher = more volatile).
tooltips.trend: Direction/strength plus key support/resistance derived from recent swings and moving averages.
tooltips.volume: Current vs average trading activity and whether participation trend is rising or falling.
tooltips.returns: Performance summary over the period: total/average returns and dispersion of outcomes.
tooltips.drawdown: Largest peak‑to‑trough decline during the period. Captures tail risk beyond simple volatility.
tooltips.sharpeRatio: Return adjusted for volatility (excess return per unit of risk). Higher is generally better.
tooltips.winRate: Share of periods with positive return within the analyzed window.

forecast.confidence68Help: 68% confidence approximates ±1 standard deviation; 95% is ±2 standard deviations.

stats.movingAveragesNotAvailable: Moving averages not available for 24h timeframe
stats.selectLongerTimeframe: Select a longer timeframe to view MA data

tooltips.averagePrice: Average price over the selected period. Helps smooth short‑term fluctuations.
tooltips.priceRange: Minimum and maximum observed prices within the selected period, and the span between them.
tooltips.dailyVolatility: Typical daily variability in price (percent). Higher = larger day‑to‑day swings.
tooltips.dataCoverage: Share of expected data points actually present for this period. 100% means no missing days.

tooltips.summary: Quick overview of current price action, key support/resistance, and momentum. Derived from recent trends, moving averages, and volatility signals.
tooltips.riskAssessment: Composite risk view combining volatility, trend strength, drawdown risk, and data quality. Helps judge how risky the current market is.
tooltips.historicalPerformance: Context on how price behaved over the selected period: average returns, variability, and notable swings. Useful for setting expectations.

analysis.marketShowing: The market is currently showing a

toast.refreshAgainIn: You can refresh again in {seconds} seconds
toast.allMarketDataUpdated: All market data has been updated
